mapper.sql: select t.id, t.code, t.name, t.remark, t.dictionary_id, t.is_enabled, t.is_systemic, t.is_deleted, t.created_by, t.created_time, t.last_modified_by, t.last_modified_time, t.deleted_by, t.deleted_time from sys_dictionary_item t
